settings.title: Step 1
settings.description: Lie on your back and simultaneously raise your torso and bring your knees toward your chest.
settings.note: Exhale as you contract your abs and try to bring your elbows toward your knees.
settings.caution: Focus on crunching your abs and avoid using momentum or pulling your neck with your hands.

settings.title: Double Crunch
settings.subtitle: An effective core exercise that targets the entire abdominal region by combining an upper and lower crunch. Perfect for building core strength, improving stability, and developing defined abs.
settings.about_description: Double Crunch is a compound core exercise that simultaneously engages the upper and lower abdominals. By bringing both the torso and knees together, this movement creates maximum tension in the rectus abdominis, making it highly effective for building core strength and definition. The exercise requires controlled movement and proper breathing, making it ideal for developing a strong, stable core foundation.
